outputs.output_descr: This project aims to support knowledge-sharing of international best practice and experiences in governance assessments, to facilitate a participatory consultative process in suggesting key elements and issues for governance assessment in China's development context, and to build a broad consensus among national stakeholders on a framework that is nationally owned. This effort may then lead to a further stage of indicator development for governance assessment.

project_descr: Support for the Development of a Social Governance Assessment Index System in China
project_title: Support for the Development of a Social Governance Asses
